channel.title: Feedback on Daniel Watts
channel.description: Recent content in Feedback on Daniel Watts

item.title: How we do production release announcements at Driftrock
item.description: At Driftrock we’re a small company that has grown from 8 to 18 people in the last 9 months. That’s not excessive but it still challenged some existing methods of communication. One of those was how we communicate new features which have recently gone live, somewhere along the way we stopped doing this.
